homePageText.title: Azure API Management Service Diagnostics
homePageText.description: Use Azure API Management Service Diagnostics to investigate how your service is performing, diagnose issues, and discover how to improve its reliability. Select the problem category that best matches the information or tool that you're interested in:

categories.name: Performance and Availability
categories.description: Check your API service's health and discover performance issues

categories.name: Proxy and Policies
categories.description: Found out if your API proxy and policy are misconfigured

categories.name: Gateway Performance
categories.description: Analyze your API Gateway performance and discover issues

categories.name: Service Upgrade
categories.description: Check your service SKU and discover your service upgrade events
